ygData.subject: RE: Bards questing
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope you re talking about the Day the Earth Stood Still, and NOT Evil Dead 3 :) Bien p.s.  I do enjoy Evil Dead 3, but it s not one of the best movies of all
ygData.messageBody:
I hope you're talking about the Day the Earth Stood Still, and NOT Evil Dead
3 :)

Bien
p.s. I do enjoy Evil Dead 3, but it's not one of the best movies of all
time, hehe

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [SMTP:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 11:19 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards questing
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

> >
> >Psah, Evil Deal Part 3 - my you must be a young one.. True Sci-Fi
> >aficionados know this phrase originated in the 1951 Classic "The Day the
> >Earth Stood Still". This is a stunning film with serious cultural
> >overtones
> >regarding the Cold War and is a serious religious allegory. If you never
> >seen it - make a point to...
> >
> >Slyde
> >aka Dan Sniderman (my apologies - but I took a lot of film classes in
> >college)
>
> One of the best Sci-Fi movies of all time and diffently ahead of its time.
>
> Go rent it tonight :)
